conf01: during installation automatically publishes a config
conf02: If you want to update config file, then just run artisan command
conf_title: String to display in page title
conf_logo: Logo displayed in the upper panel
conf_logo_mini: Admin mini logo for small display or minimized sidebar
conf_middleware: Middleware that restrict the administrative module from unauthorized users
conf_enable_editor: Enabling and adding editing ENV settings
conf_env_editor_url: Slug for editing env settings file
conf_env_editor_excluded_keys: An array of keys or key masks to hide in the settings ENV-editor
conf_env_editor_middlewares: Adding an middleware for editing settings
conf_imagesuploaddirectory: Image upload directory. Relative path from `public` directory
conf_filesuploaddirectory: File upload directory. Relative path from `public` directory
conf_datetimeformat: Date and time formats for form and display elements
conf_dt_autoupdate_class: Auto-update class. If not specified, all datatables will be auto-updated
